slide.description: WaxBall is a custom WordPress theme made from scratch for my personal blog. This serves as a playground for my ideas as well as a place to experiment with how content is presented.
slide.title: Homepage

slide.description: The blog content varies from short single-image style to longer-form posts including many visuals. I wanted to create a simple presentation that accomodated both these styles.
slide.title: Post

slide.description: The archive displays a simple grid layout with titles and featured images.
slide.title: Archives

slide.description: The controls for sorting the archives are segmented into categories and sorted by date.
slide.title: Sorting
